casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jerry Giovani THOMPSON 24A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 24, 2018 Erik R. Zimmerman, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Thompson, Jerry. Robert T. Broughton, Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney Generals, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 24th of April 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of April 2018."
